description:
A short game in which young woman travels to her aunt’s cabin after losing her boyfriend in a fatal car accident. Features an original soundtrack. Developed for the 16th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam

Controls ZInteract/SelectXMenuArrow Keys
WalkShift + Arrow Keys
Run Credits

Dark Ride Entertainment are:

  • Matt
  • Ollie 
  • Will

Tilesets Used:

  •     Ancient Dungeons Base Pack [Copyright](C) Celianna
  •     Modern Urban Tileset [Copyright](C) Degica, Co. LTD

Plugins Used:

  •     Dynamic Title Images (YEP) by Yanfly Engine Plugins

Character Generators Used:

  •     Zombie man Generator [Copyright](C) Gee-kun-soft

Sounds Used:

  •     Car Crash Skid PE809001 by Videvo

Made with RPGMaker MV
